      org.bson.Document save()
      Collectibles are saved to documents within a document example: active: { "Pet": "Monkey", "Shovel": "15" } held: { "Shovel": "15" } collection: { { "type": "Pet" "collection": { { identifier: "Monkey", info: InfoDoc }, { identifier: "Owl", info: InfoDoc } } }, { "type": "Shovel" "collection": { { identifier: "15", info: InfoDoc } } } }

        Collectibles are saved to documents within a document example: active: { "Pet": "Monkey", "Shovel": "15" } held: { "Shovel": "15" } collection: { { "type": "Pet" "collection": { { identifier: "Monkey", info: InfoDoc }, { identifier: "Owl", info: InfoDoc } } }, { "type": "Shovel" "collection": { { identifier: "15", info: InfoDoc } } } }
